rukus.text: 45|27|Farmonravoii osmonho va zamin az oni Alloh taolo ast va ruze, ki qijomat ʙarpo savad, ahli ʙotil zijonkor xohand ʙud

45|28|[Dar on ruz] har guruhero [az vahsati hisoʙu cazo xoru] ʙa zonudaromada meʙini, hamaro ʙaroi [giriftani] nomai a'molason faro mexonand [va ʙa onon xitoʙ mesavad]: «Imruz sumo dar ʙaroʙari on ci kardaed, cazo meʙined
45|29|In nomai [a'moli sumo nazdi] most, ki ʙa haq ʙar sumo guvohi medihad. Mo [tamomi] amalkardatonro [daqiqan] saʙt mekardem
45|30|Mu'minoni nekukorro Parvardigorason farogiriftai rahmati xes qaror xohad dod. In hamon komjoʙii oskor ast
45|31|Vale [ʙa] kofiron [xitoʙ mesavad]: «Magar na in ʙud, ki dar ʙaroʙari ojoti Man, ki ʙar sumo arza mesud, gardankasi mekarded va guruhe ʙazahkor ʙuded
45|32|Va cun gufta mesud: «Va'dai Alloh taolo haq ast va [dar vuqui] qijomat hec tardide nest», megufted: Namedonem qijomat cist, faqat tasavvure [dar] in mavrid] dorem, va [-le] ʙa jaqin narasidaem»
45|33|Raftori zistason ʙar onon oskor mesavad va azoʙe, ki masxaraas mekardand, domangirason xohad sud
45|34|[Ba onon] gufta mesavad: «Imruz [dar azoʙi duzax] rahojaton mekunem, cunonki sumo [niz dar dunjo nisʙat] ʙa didori imruz ʙee'tino ʙuded va cojgohaton otas ast va hec jovare naxohed dost
45|35|In [giriftori] az on rust, ki ojoti ilohiro masxara mekarded va zindagii dunjo fireʙaton doda ʙud». Imruz [kofironro] az otas ʙerun naxohand ovard va az onon darxosti puzis namesavad
45|36|Pas, sitois maxsusi Alloh taolo ast, Parvardigori osmonho va zamin va tamomi cahonijon
45|37|Buzurgi dar osmonho va zamin az oni Ust va U sikastnopaziri hakim ast
